IBW M k g = 50 k g + 2.3 ( Height i n - 60 i n ) IBW F k g = 45.5 k g + 2.3 ( Height i n - 60 i n ) N B W = I B W + 0.25 * ( w t - I B W ) Serum Osm = 2 * [ Na ] + + BUN 2.8 + BG 18 Corrected Na = [Na] serum + 1.6 [ BG - 100 100 ] TBW M = 0.6 ( L / k g ) * w t ( k g ) TBW F = 0.5 ( L / k g ) * w t ( k g ) Na Deficit = TBW ( [ Na ] goal - [ Na ] serum ) FWD = TBW ( [Na] serum 140 - 1 ) Ca Corrected = Ca measured + 0.8 * ( 4 - Albumin ) Δ [Na] = Na fluid - Na serum T B W + 1
